mapper.select: select method,interface_url from operation where pk_operation_id= (select operation_id from role_operation where role_id= (select role_id from user_role where user_id=#{userId}) )
select menu_name,url,icon,description,sort_value from menu where pk_menu_id= (select menu_id from role_menu where role_id= (select role_id from user_role where user_id=#{userId}) )
